channel.title: Parser on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Parser on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Living with a new Parser for a year
item.description: Hi folks! Today’s post is a retrospective. I would like to gather some thoughts about living with the new parser that I wrote for JsonPath. After a little over a year, some interesting problems surfaced that I thought I’d share for people who also would like to endeavor on this path. Let’s begin. Previously About, two years ago, I took over managing / fixing / improving this ruby gem: Json Parser.
